name: Fight the Lies!
description:
Pen+ink+pencil on 300gsm paper | 2018

2nd piece in my Lettering Journey. It was made back then when lies hoaxes are pretty often and take a lot of victims because of the lack of literacy. This work reminds us to always check the truth of something, whether it's news or what other people say because it could be untrue or unproven. This applies universally not only in a relationship
